data.name: Err:DbConstraintViolated
data.value: The data you entered conflicts with a database constraint.

data.name: Err:DbConstraintViolated_Custom
data.value: The data you entered conflicts with a custom database constraint.

data.name: Err:DbConstraintViolated_PK
data.value: The primary key of a record you were attempting to modify conflicts with the primary key of an existing record.

data.name: Err:DbConstraintViolated_Unique
data.value: The data you entered conflicts with unique data in an existing record.

data.name: Err:DbConstraintViolated_FK
data.value: A record you were attempting to modify contains a foreign key to a database record that does not exist.

data.name: Err:DbConstraintViolated_PKInUse
data.value: A record you were attempting to delete or modify is referenced by other records.

data.name: Err:InvalidDbOperation_ImplicitConversion
data.value: The data you entered conflicts with the database schema.

data.name: Err:InvalidDbOperation_ImplicitTruncation
data.value: The data you entered conflicts with the database schema.

data.name: Err:DbConstraintViolated_Null
data.value: You must enter values for all required fields.

data.name: Err:DbConcurrency
data.value: While you were editing, another user updated the same record(s) you were modifying. We recommend you cancel this edit, and start the edit process again with the updated information.

data.name: Err:DbConcurrency_Table
data.value: While you were editing, another user updated the same {Table} record(s) you were modifying. We recommend you cancel this edit, and start the edit process again with the updated information.

data.name: Err:DbConcurrency_RecordDeleted
data.value: While you were editing, another user deleted the same record(s) you were modifying.

data.name: Err:DbConcurrency_RecordDeleted_Table
data.value: While you were editing, another user deleted the same {Table} record(s) you were modifying.

data.value: While you were editing, another user updated the same record you were modifying. We recommend you cancel this edit, and start the edit process again with the updated information.

data.name: Val:InvalidValue
data.value: The {FieldName} value you entered is invalid. It may be invalid for a number of reasons. You may have entered a value that is longer than what is allowed, the value may contain invalid characters or the value might be out of range of allowed values. Please review the value and correct it and submit the changes again.
